attributes.action: Stop BSL. legalise the life of dogs which are being euthanised due to their look
attributes.background: Today is the 28th anniversary of breed specific legislation (BSL), where dogs are euthanised or locked away for their looks and the rumours which surround their breed. A breed which is commonly known for BSL is pit bulls, a loving and caring breed. Please sign this petition and stop BSL for good.
